title: Sweat (A-La-La-Long)
lyrics:
[intro]
(C) A la la la la (Am)long, a la la la la (Dm)long long li long long (G)long  x2
 
(C) Standing (Am)across the room (Dm) I saw you (G)smile
(C) Said I wanna (Am)talk to you (Dm) for a little (G)while
(C) But before I (Am)make my move my (Dm)emotion starts running (G)wild
(C) My tongue gets (Am)tied and (Dm)that no (G)lie
Looking in your (C) eyes (Am)  (Dm)
(G)Looking in your big brown (C)eyes
(Am) Ooh girl  and I've (Dm)got this to say to (G)you Yeah!
 
[chorus]
(C) Girl I want to (Am)make you sweat
(Dm) Sweat till you cant (G) sweat no more
(C) And if you (Am)cry out        
(Dm) I'm gonna push it some (G)mo-o-ore
(C) Girl I want to (Am)make you sweat
(Dm) Sweat till you cant (G) sweat no more
(C) And if you (Am)cry out
(Dm) I'm gonna push it
(G)Push it, push it some (C)more
 
A la la la la (Am)long, a la la la la (Dm)long long li long long (G)long
(C) A la la la la (Am)long, a la la la la (Dm)long long li long long (G)long
 
(C) So I said (Am)to myself if she (Dm)love me or (G)no
(C) But the drag I (Am)know our (Dm)love is here to (G)stay     
With a (C)little bit of this and a (Am)little bit of that
(Dm) The lyrics go (G)under attack
(C) My tongue gets (Am)tied and (Dm)that no (G)lie
Looking in your (C) eyes (Am)   (Dm)
(G) Looking in your big brown (C)eyes
(Am) Ooh girl, I've (Dm)got this to say to (G)you
 
[chorus]
(C) Girl I want to (Am)make you sweat
(Dm) Sweat till you cant (G) sweat no more
(C) And if you (Am)cry out        
(Dm) I'm gonna push it some (G)mo-o-ore
(C) Girl I want to (Am)make you sweat
(Dm) Sweat till you cant (G) sweat no more
(C) And if you (Am)cry out
(Dm) I'm gonna push it
(G)Push it, push it some (C)more
 
A la la la la (Am)long, a la la la la (Dm)long long li long long (G)long
(C) A la la la la (Am)long, a la la la la (Dm)long long li long long (G)long   
(C-cha cha cha) [end]
